column28: Illumina HiSeq 2000 sequencing; RNA-seq analysis of wild type Columbia seedlings
column29: Protocols: Seeds were surface-sterilized and sown in MS-agar medium and stratified at 4Â°C in darkness for 3 days, then germinated for one week under long days (16h light/8h dark) at 21Â°C.  RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen) and DNase I treated (Promega) preparation of strand-specific cDNA libraries: Purification of poly-A containing mRNA molecules; mRNA fragmentation; Random primed cDNA synthesis (strand specific); Adapter ligation and adapter specific PCR amplification.
